page.title: 03SHOPPING IN OUR AREA
page.content: The nearest large shop is a supermarket where you can buy almost anything but most especially food .None of us live close enough to walk there so we usually go once a week by car to shop. Locally, we have several small shops. The main one is a post office where you can buy stamps and postal orders. Outside there is a post box to send your letters. The post office also sells food,newspapers,sweets,drinks, vegetables,and some toys. In the village there is also a small food shop that sells tinned food and frozen food. If we need things for our garden there is a garden centre in the village as well. The shops usually close by 5.30pm but sometimes an ice cream van will come later, selling ice cream and drinks.
